TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT: NL During Bocchi's Solo, #yGroove #yDamage deals an additional #b50% damage. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yBocchi card played.
NL During Kita's Solo, draw #b2 additional cards at the start of each turn. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yKita card played.
NL During Nijika's Solo, remove an additional #b1 stack when removing #yBocchi #yAnxiety. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yNijika card played.
NL During Ryo's Solo, #yGroove gained is doubled. NL Gain #b1 #yGroove for each #yRyo card played.
